course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Information Strategy and Management
course.description: Examination of economic principles of information systems strategy, highlighting application of economics and management principles to the unique environment of information services and information-enabled competition.

reviews.author: Thomsonlight
reviews.title: Excellent course with outstanding professor
reviews.comment_content: The content is very interesting. It introduces the trend in business IT and trains our mindset in deciding what to invest. It is not technical and well designed for a businessman.
reviews.comment_teaching: G1 is always an excellent professor. His class is very interesting. He is very experienced in teaching people. He is able to introduce the concepts in an easy way.
reviews.comment_grading: The grade is good as long as you have completed all assignments and done enough revisions.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is heavy. There are a reading every week and 2 project assignments throughout the course. It also covers lots of topics. So your revision may also be time consuming.
